title: ICU Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions: I am during the process right now. I applied through the official website and got an invitation for a phone interview and then they made up a schedule for a hiring manager interview at the unit.
Interview Questions: Introduce yourself How did you cope with conflicts?

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions: Be honest about how soon you are able to accept a position. Mention certs like ACLS/PALS/BLS. Offer to shadow for an hour if possible. When you walk around meeting possible coworkers, smile and say nice to meet you and do not mention future educational goals.
Interview Questions: How do you handle stressful situations.

title: Practice Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant (Chicago, IL) in Dec 2022
Interview Descriptions: Great experience and everyone seemed very friendly doing the course of the interview process. I applied for the position and was notified for a phone interview within a week. Afterwards, followed by two interviews with two separate meetings with two Directors.
Interview Questions: Why the career change? How do you handle difficult situations? Did you ever have to say "NO"? What's your background?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions: FaceTime interview with manager, and then phone interview with HR. Both very nice and showed virtual tour of the unit. Also got to chat and ask questions with current employees
Interview Questions: how would you deal with a conflict with a coworker

title: Clinical Staff Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: The admin secretary called me to schedule an interview and then immediately got interviewed by the director via zoom. HR offered me the job a few days after and I accepted.
Interview Questions:
What are your long term goals?
Are you proficient in Epic EMR?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions: To the point and fairly easy.  The interview was in person. It took about 2 weeks to get a response back from the hiring team.  The hiring manager was very nice and responsive to my questions
Interview Questions: Simple and usual questions that are asked. Why do you want to be a RN

title: Human Resources Coordinator (HR Coordinator) Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant (Chicago, IL) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: Wonderful. The first round was over zoom which was set up quick and easy to access. The second round was in person. The team was helpful, considerate and very nice.
Interview Questions: What do you do when you have too much on your plate?

title: Therapist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions: It was a Multidisciplinary approach. I thought that everyone was very friendly. The grounds were clean and well kept. The staff seemed to get along well together. Overall it was great and a good experience.
Interview Questions: What brings you to interview here

title: StaffRN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions: I applied through their website and first got email for Phone interview with unit manager , 30min phone interview with unit manager and scheduled for HR interview for background check.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work at Swedish hospital?

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions: I did my clinical here, the manager offered me a position, and I applied online. It took a week to hear from HR and a week later I got an offer
Interview Questions: what are your weaknesses?

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant (Chicago, IL)
Interview Descriptions: HR contacted by phone. Call lasted about 15mins. After the phone interview, i was interviewed by manager who gave the run down of salary which was not negotiable. Both interviews were very short.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here? Where do you see yourself in the future with this organization?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant (Chicago, IL) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: No HR recruiter contacted me, only hiring manager. Interview went smoothly: asked very unit-specific questions. Courtesy thank you email given at 1 week and phone call and follow up email at week 2. NO replies given. No official rejection letter, but the position is now closed on HR website. AWFUL HR and interview experience. Don't think anyone knows how to communicate at this organization.
Interview Questions: Describe your learning style.

title: Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant (Chicago, IL)
Interview Descriptions: I did a phone interview which resulted to a face to face interview. My phone interview was basically about 10 to 15 minutes . I was asked questions pertaining to my experience and education, Everything had seemed to be going well. At the end of the phone interview I was invited for a face to face,
Interview Questions: What is my experience in ortho?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions: Interview was with unit manager and HR person, lasted about 2 hours total. Was asked about clinical experience and how I acted in certain situations.  Was given a tour of the unit I would be working on also
Interview Questions: Would you float to other units within the hospital?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant (Chicago, IL) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with HR, followed by in person interview with both Clinical Manager and Department Supervisor, had a follow up interview with the nurses on the unit on the same day. Was offered a position same day.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions:
I was called by the manager of my unit before Human Resources was even aware that I applied. Human Resources is EXTREMELY disorganized and they do not give priority to inside employers.
Interview at least went ok
Interview Questions:
GOALS
PAST EXPERIENCE
WEAKNESS

title: Unit Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant (Chicago, IL) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: Short and brief. Interested in what the candidate would do in case of falls. What were my previous customer service experiences like and why would I benefit the company. They also asked me about my educational goals and how long I wish to work at Swedish. Initially, I received a phone call then an in person interview. Needed for me to have my CNA certificate so they waited until I was officially certified to proceed with my acceptance letter. It was over a month from the hire date to the start date. Thus, if money is an issue, consider doing something in the meantime.
Interview Questions: What would you do to prevent falls? Why do you want to work at Swedish?

title: Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was pretty standard. It was my first job and I did not have much work experience so I got asked the basic questions, why this profession? how would people describe you.
Interview Questions: how would people describe you.

title: Front Desk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions: aweful.very cheap company overall. Thought that the benefits would combat the horrible pay but it just isnt worth it. They do not pay fairly for qualified experienced candidates even w/glowing references and recommendations
Interview Questions: tell me a little bit about yourself

title: Special Education Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant (Chicago, IL) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: I have been living overseas for the past decade and a half, I haven't held a US job but am currently applying for one but glassdoor wont let me enter that.. so instead i chose somewhere i trained for a month while on vacation in the us, it wasnt an actual job
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in the position?

title: ER Tech Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Swedish Covenant
Interview Descriptions: interview. background check. if they call you its to hire you.
Interview Questions: discuss what you feel is the most important aspect of healthcare.

title: Buyer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: Only had one interview, I was not what they were looking for
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this position

title: Unit Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant (Chicago, IL) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: Met with the floor supervisor. Supervisor asked standard interview questions about interest in the work, the atmosphere of hospital work and availability. She was feeling out  how much the job was wanted.She described the type of work that was done on that particular unit and accessed my skill levels. She described the type of training I would need and set the date to begin orientation.
Interview Questions:
Why do you choose to work at a hospital?
What are your career goals
Why do you choose Swedish Covenant

title: Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Swedish Covenant (Chicago, IL) in Feb 2011
Interview Descriptions: 3 interviews with one being on site analysis of skills
Interview Questions: standard questions
